name: 1x EW 112 G4 (734-776 MHz) Sennheiser Wireless Bodypack on Camera SET

name: 4x Actors Sound Recording SET (ZOOM F8, Sennheiser EW 512P G4)
description: 4x Actors Sound Recording SET with ZOOM F8 8-channel/10-track field audio recorder/mixer and Sennheiser EW 512P G4 camera-mount wireless lavalier microphone system. Ideal solution for professional recording applications on set and in the field, including music, streaming, live events and filmmaking.
includes: 1 x Recorder ZOOM F8 Multi-Track | 4 x EW 512P G4 (558-626 MHz) Sennheiser Wireless Bodypack MOBILE SET | 1 x Sound Boom Sennheiser 416 KIT | 3 x Diversity receiver Sennheiser EK 500 G4 IEM (566-608MHz) | 3 x Headphone Beyerdynamic DT-770 PRO | 2 x EW 112 G4 (734-776 MHz) Sennheiser Wireless Bodypack on Camera SET
